message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.

I appreciate your offer, but I'm not sure if I'm willing to pay $18000 for the product. I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $14000. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product to me.

I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $16500. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to you.
